Register

Get your ticket for TABConf 2021, Nov 4-6, Atlanta, GA

You can register for TABConf 2021 with either Eventbrite or OpenNode

Pricing:

Prices will be double periodically until date of conference.

Starting at $35.00 fiat penalty 40% plus fees.

Starting at $21.00 if you pay with lightning or onchain.

Pay with Eventbrite $35

pay with bitcoin $21

Optional Swag Coin:
Silver challenge coin $40

Yes prices will be rising, consider yourself lucky
